findings.title: OCTD - Owner Contract Tokens Drain
findings.description: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address

findings.title: ULTW - Unlimited Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds without limit to the team wallet, which can be abused by calling the withDraw method.

findings.title: MT - Mint Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to mint tokens, which may lead to highly inflated contract tokens.

findings.title: BT - Burn Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to burn tokens from a specific address, potentially leading to token loss.

findings.title: FSA - Fixed Swap Address
findings.description: The swap address is assigned once in the constructor and it cannot be changed. The decentralized swaps sometimes create a new swap version or abandon the current. A contract that cannot change the swap address may not be able to catch-up the upgrade.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: There are variables that are defined in the local scope and are not initialized.
